episodios.nome: The Best Games Make Reconnaissance Fun
A Happy Ending Doesn't Mean This Game Is Over
Battles Are Better When You're Against Someone Whose Signature Move Is the Opposite of Yours
Villagers Have Their Own Way of Life
If You Keep Upgrading Your Initial Equipment, It'll Usually Become Your Most Powerful Weapon
Everyone Has Different Expectations About a Big Event
Important Items Are Usually Lying Around in Enchanted Forests
Sometimes the Main Character Can't Enter the Village of Another Species on His Own
If you don't make up your mind, the story won't advance
The patterns carved into the stone tablet are connected to the mysteries of the world
Even fairies feel lonely when they're away from their spring by themselves
Sometimes the ancient tome in the first town is the key to the final dungeon
You're sure to find what you want on the other side of the magic door

metadata_completo.sinopse:
Fumiya Tomozaki is now cruising through the game of life—all thanks to the guidance of Aoi Hinami, his popular classmate and rival in the online game Attack Families, widely known as "Tackfam." As the summer holiday draws to a close and a new term commences, Tomozaki reunites with Aoi, who reminds him of his ultimate goals: to become well-liked among his peers and find himself a girlfriend.

However, Tomozaki puts his ambitions on hold when his innocent friend, Hanabi Natsubayashi, starts being bullied. To make matters worse, Aoi is characteristically out of touch with the situation. But Tomozaki is not alone in resolving this issue—he now has a group of loyal friends who are all determined to help Hanabi and ensure they enjoy their youths together to the fullest.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
